column5: Welcome to the Oct. 2007 issue (Issue #82!) of the Ontario Fishing Network E-Magazine. We have great new issue this month.  Visit the link below to read this months info packed issue:  http://www.ontariofishing.net/news/oct2007-1.html  Fall River Walleye Tactics By Tim Allard  The Mistakes and Angler Makes.
